verbs.description: [V: skateboarding] [ARG0: community] rallies against violence after attack on mother and son a mother and her teenage son were attacked at a louisville skate park and the skateboarding community is standing with the victims breslin park noah hulsman floyd freels downtown louisville skate park skateboarding louisville kentucky
